system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice. Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

As a Food and Tobacco Roasting, Baking, and Drying Machine Operators and Tenders with Professional Degree, your work involves operate or tend food or tobacco roasting, baking, or drying equipment, including hearth ovens, kiln driers, roasters, char kilns, and vacuum drying equipment.

You approach tasks with curious about many different things and values artistic experiences You are known for being reliable in commitments, does tasks thoroughly, and organized and methodical In your interactions, you are confident in social situations and outgoing and sociable When working with others, you are harmonious in relationships and trusting of people Under pressure, you are confident in abilities, adapts to change easily, and stays calm under pressure.
